name: Cowboy Single Fighter Shooting
description:
You will clash unlimited enemies with your familiar weapon: Cannon Gun. On the Road, you have to fight against their forces, too. Be careful! Any wrong shooting , you will die by the kill shot of enemies. These Enemies are so dangerous.

How to play Cowboy:
– Just tap on the screen when you choose the suitable moment to release shot

You only need to shoot the Enemies. Collect coins and run.
Shoot the enemies of and clear the way.
